entry.title: Flamingo #2 - Pink T-shirt for Men
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sarman Fashion
Type: Men's Short Sleeves Shirt
Price: 65.99

- Round neck hooded

- Embroidered logo on the chest

- Short sleeve

- Straight bottom edge of the product

- With straps on biceps 

- Machine washable

- cotton 95%, elastane 5%

 

MODEL 1

Arms: 20 inch
Weight: 220Lbs
T-Shirt Size: Large

 

MODEL 2
Length: 5’11
Weight: 220Lbs
T-Shirt Size: XL

entry.title: Jangel - Green Track Pant for Men
entry.summary:
Vendor: Sarman Fashion
Type: Athletic Pants
Price: 44.99

- Side slanting pockets

- Pants on a cord

- Logo on the thigh

- Cuffs of Riba

- skin-tight cut product

- Machine washable

- 65% Cotton 35% Polyester 

 

* Important Message: This Jogger was Made little bit smaller than normal size because this is 65% cotton and 35% polyester. If you like to be little loose please take 1 size up from the other joggers. Thank you

 

MODEL 1
Length: 1.80m
Weight: 202Lbs
Shirt Size: Medium
